comments:
Description:
EvaluatorException throws when set some background style in onCreate method.

Steps to reproduce:
1. preview attached design file in bug #120318

Expected result:
Background style works

Actual result:
BackgroundRepeat/backgrounPositionX/PositionY didn't work and exceptin were throws as below:
Error0 : Error.ScriptEvaluationError ( 1 time(s) )
detail : org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.EngineException: There are errors evaluating script "style.backgroundImage="http://images.google.com/images?q=tbn:f6ZpEl_5Rx4J:scout.wisc.edu/Projects/PastProjects/gimages/go_dark.gif"
style.backgroundRepeat="no-repeat"".

Fixed. Changed method name from getRepeat/setRepeat to getBackgroundRepeat/setBackgroundRepeat.
Background style still didn't show up.

It seems that setting backgroundImage in onCreate does not work. It doesn't throw an exception anymore like the original bug report says.
This is not just an issue for table, but for all items. It works in onRender which uses the same class. This class modifies the content object. The content object is modified correctly, both in onCreate and in onRender.

These are some cases I have tried:
- Modify backgroundImage in onRender -> works in preview, preview in html, but not in preview in pdf
- Modify backgroundImage in onCreate -> does not work in preview, preview in html, or preview in pdf

This does is not a script error. The content object is modified, but it is not handled correctly. 

Some places to start looking:
TableItemExecutor.execute, after the lines:
if ( context.isInFactory( ) )
{
    TableScriptExecutor.handleOnCreate( ( TableContent ) tableContent,
	context );
}

the content object has been modified by the script. (try tableContent.getStyle().getBackgroundImage()).
backgroundPostionX, backgroundPositionY should be supported in IScriptStyle
Fixed. Added get/setBackgroundPositionX/Y to IScriptStyle. Seems to works correctly.

causedBy.message: Java class "org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.script.internal.instance.StyleInstance" has no public instance field or method named "backgroundRepeat". (#2)
